gw.api.assignment

Interface UserRoleOwner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, IGosuObject, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, Versionable

    public interface UserRoleOwner
extends Editable
    Interface for entities which have a UserRole array for "secondary" assignments.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentRoleAssignment

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate getCurrentRoleAssignment()
        Returns the user role assignment for the current rule execution

      • assignUserRole

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate assignUserRole(User user,
                                        Group group,
                                        UserRole role)
        Assigns the given User/Group pair to the given role on this assignable object. If the role is exclusive, replaces the existing assignment. Otherwise, adds a new assignment for the given User/Group pair, if none already exists for that role.
        Parameters:
        user -
        group -
        role -

      • unassignUserRole

        void unassignUserRole(User user,
                    UserRole role)
        Removes the role from the given User on this assignable object.
        Parameters:
        user -
        role -

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate getUserRoleAssignment(User user,
                                               UserRole userRole)
        Gets the assignment that corresponds to the given user and role, or null if none matches.
        Parameters:
        user -
        userRole -
        Returns:

      • isExclusive

        boolean isExclusive(UserRole userRole)
        Determines whether the given role is exclusive for this type of assignable object.
        Parameters:
        userRole -
        Returns:

      • autoAssignRole

        boolean autoAssignRole(UserRole role)
        Assigns the UserRole for this assignable item. This uses rules to find the right assignment
        Parameters:
        role - The role to assign

      • getUserRoleAssignmentByRole

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate getUserRoleAssignmentByRole(UserRole role)
        Gets the user role assignment for that role If there's no assignment for that role, returns null. If there is more than one assignment for that role, then the first role will be returned. Note: getUserRoleAssignmentsByRole(UserRole) should be called if multiple assignments are expected to return.
        Parameters:
        role - The role for the assignment

      • getUserRoleAssignmentsByRole

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate[] getUserRoleAssignmentsByRole(UserRole role)
        Get the user role assignments for that role. If no assignment for that role, then an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        role - The role for the assignment
        Returns:
        an array of user role assignments for the given role. The array is empty if no such user role assignment.

      • getOrCreateUserRoleAssignmentByRole

        UserRoleAssignmentDelegate getOrCreateUserRoleAssignmentByRole(UserRole role)
        Gets the user role assignment for that role If there's no assignment for that role, creates a new one. If there is more than one assignment for that role, then the first role will be returned no matter whether the role is exclusive or not.
        Parameters:
        role - The role for the assignment
        Returns:
        the existing user role assignment if found, or a new one if not found
        See Also:
        getUserRoleAssignmentByRole(gw.pl.assignment.typekey.UserRole)
